title: List of Georgia Institute of Technology alumni
data: Director of the Georgia Tech Research Institute 's Electronic Systems Laboratory

Electrical engineer ; inventor ; businessman ; discovered the Coulter principle , which provides a methodology for counting , measuring and evaluating microscopic particles suspended in fluid ; namesake of Georgia Tech and Emory 's Wallace H. Coulter Department of Biomedical Engineering
Turkish materials scientist specializing in surface engineering and tribology
Dean of Georgia Tech 's College of Engineering ( 1992-2011 )
Inventor of the Gang-Nail connector plate
Entrepreneur and inventor ; received honorary doctorate from Georgia Tech in 2008
Electrical engineer known for his work in circuit analysis
Former dean of the Georgia Tech College of Engineering ; notable in the field of computer-aided manufacturing of integrated circuits
Deputy director and director of research at the Georgia Tech Research Institute since 2007 ; previously chief engineer and program manager for Lockheed Martin 's F-22 Raptor Avionics Team
Roboticist ; recipient of the 2001 Pirelli Award ; recipient of 2001 Top Pirelli Prize ; inventor of the Entomopter
Ceramic engineer at Georgia Tech and the founder of its Department of Ceramic Engineering , now known as Georgia Tech 's School of Materials Science and Engineering
Automobile designer ; head of General Motors Corporation International Operations Design ; transferred to Art Center College of Design after his first year at Georgia Tech
Developer of the Saffir-Simpson Hurricane Scale
Control theorist , professor and Julian T. Hightower Chair in Systems and Controls in Georgia Tech 's School of Electrical and Computer Engineering
Professor of ceramic engineering at Georgia Tech and the founder and first director of what is now the Georgia Tech Research Institute
Professor of industrial engineering at Georgia Tech ; supply sergeant during World War II and the Korean War
Professor , engineer , and college football coach ; professor of mechanical engineering and the head football coach at Arkansas Industrial University ( now known as the University of Arkansas )
intro:
This list of Georgia Institute of Technology alumni includes graduates, non-graduate former students, and current students of Georgia Tech. Notable administration, faculty, and staff are found on the list of Georgia Institute of Technology faculty. Georgia Tech alumni are generally known as Yellow Jackets. According to the Georgia Tech Alumni Association,
.
